languages.text: После уничтожения Летуса десятина попала в цепкие руки Администратума. Клерки спрятали богатства Простора Коронус на склады, а спустя несколько лет было решено транспортировать подать через Зев, где баржи с несметными богатствами сгинули бесследно.

Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.
languages.original_text: После уничтожения Летуса десятина попала в цепкие руки Администратума. Клерки спрятали богатства Простора Коронус на склады, а спустя несколько лет было решено транспортировать подать через Зев, где баржи с несметными богатствами сгинули бесследно.

traits.locale_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without trace.

A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without trace.

A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

languages.text: Nach der Zerstörung von Leethus gelangte sein Zehnt in den beharrlichen Griff des Administratums. Die Beamten stapelten den Wohlstand der Koronus-Ausdehnung in Lagerhäusern. Einige Jahre später wurde beschlossen, den Tribut durch den Schlund zu transportieren, wo die Barken mit dem immensen Reichtum jedoch spurlos verschwanden.
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Zerstörung von Leethus gelangte sein Zehnt in den beharrlichen Griff des Administratums. Die Beamten stapelten den Wohlstand der Koronus-Ausdehnung in Lagerhäusern. Einige Jahre später wurde beschlossen, den Tribut durch den Schlund zu transportieren, wo die Barken mit dem immensen Reichtum jedoch spurlos verschwanden.

languages.text: Après la destruction de Leethus, sa dîme atterrit entre les mains cupides de l'Administratum, et les greffiers s'empressèrent de stocker les richesses des Étendues de Koronus dans des entrepôts. Quelques années plus tard, la décision fut prise de transporter le tribut à travers La Gueule, où les barges transportant l'immense richesse disparurent sans laisser de trace.
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Après la destruction de Leethus, sa dîme atterrit entre les mains cupides de l'Administratum, et les greffiers s'empressèrent de stocker les richesses des Étendues de Koronus dans des entrepôts. Quelques années plus tard, la décision fut prise de transporter le tribut à travers La Gueule, où les barges transportant l'immense richesse disparurent sans laisser de trace.

languages.text: 利瑟斯毁灭之后，什一税最终落入了帝国内政部的掌控之中，不计其数的财富被储藏在达戈努斯的仓库中。几年后，内政部命令将神圣什一税送往帝国，然而负责运输的货船，以及货船上不计其数的财富，都在巨口之中消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: 利瑟斯毁灭之后，什一税最终落入了帝国内政部的掌控之中，不计其数的财富被储藏在达戈努斯的仓库中。几年后，内政部命令将神圣什一税送往帝国，然而负责运输的货船，以及货船上不计其数的财富，都在巨口之中消失得无影无踪。

languages.text: Tras la destrucción de Leethus, su diezmo acabó en el tenaz control del Administratum. Los funcionarios acumularon la riqueza de la Extensión de Koronus en almacenes. Unos años después, se tomó la decisión de transportar el tributo a través de las Fauces, donde las naves, junto con su inmensa riqueza, se perdieron sin dejar rastro.
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Tras la destrucción de Leethus, su diezmo acabó en el tenaz control del Administratum. Los funcionarios acumularon la riqueza de la Extensión de Koronus en almacenes. Unos años después, se tomó la decisión de transportar el tributo a través de las Fauces, donde las naves, junto con su inmensa riqueza, se perdieron sin dejar rastro.

languages.text: リーザス滅亡後、その租税は帝国行政局の執拗な管理のもとに置かれた。事務員たちはコロヌス・エクスパンスの富を倉庫にしまい込み、数年後、その貢ぎ物をマウを越えて輸送する決定が下された。だが、その莫大な富を積んだ輸送艦隊は、跡形もなく姿を消してしまった。
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: リーザス滅亡後、その租税は帝国行政局の執拗な管理のもとに置かれた。事務員たちはコロヌス・エクスパンスの富を倉庫にしまい込み、数年後、その貢ぎ物をマウを越えて輸送する決定が下された。だが、その莫大な富を積んだ輸送艦隊は、跡形もなく姿を消してしまった。

languages.text: Aşar, Leethus'un yıkımını takiben Administratum'un inatçı pençesine düştü. Kâtipler, Koronus Enginliği'nin servetini depolarda sakladı. Birkaç yıl sonra bu aşarın Ağız'ın ötesine taşınmasına karar verildi ancak devasa serveti taşıyan mavnalar, iz bırakmadan ortadan kayboldu.
languages.original_text: Following Leethus's destruction, its tithe ended up in the tenacious grip of the Administratum. The clerks stashed the wealth of the Koronus Expanse away in warehouses. A few years later, a decision was made to transport the tribute across the Maw, where the barges carrying the immense wealth were lost without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Aşar, Leethus'un yıkımını takiben Administratum'un inatçı pençesine düştü. Kâtipler, Koronus Enginliği'nin servetini depolarda sakladı. Birkaç yıl sonra, bu aşarın Ağız'ın ötesine taşınmasına karar verildi ancak devasa serveti taşıyan mavnalar iz bırakmadan ortadan kayboldu.
